page.title: 07HOMELIFE AT HEADLEY PARK
page.content: {HOMELIFE} In my house we have four people. My Dad, Mum, Kimberley my sister and me. My Mum works in a shop and is called Carole Bennett. My Dad is a policeman and his name is Ian Bennett. The work which is needed to be done round the house is vacuuming, dusting, two kinds of washing, ironing and many other things. I help my Mum by keeping my room tidy. At our home we have two rabbits _ one is a grey one called Fluffy and one is a white one called Twinkle. We clean them out every week by putting sawdust in and hay and fresh water. We take our rabbits for a walk in the back garden but they don't enjoy it. In our house we have to abide by rules such as safety in the home, matches and medicines on high shelves, saucepan handles facing inwards. S.BENNETT
